Uses of Class
org.kiji.schema.util.ResourceUtils.DoAnd

Packages that use ResourceUtils.DoAnd
org.kiji.schema.util Package containing utility classes used throughout Kiji. 
 

Uses of ResourceUtils.DoAnd in org.kiji.schema.util
 

Subclasses of ResourceUtils.DoAnd in org.kiji.schema.util
static class ResourceUtils.DoAndClose<RESOURCE extends Closeable,RET>
          Perform an action with a Closeable resource and then close the resource.
static class ResourceUtils.DoAndRelease<RESOURCE extends ReferenceCountable<RESOURCE>,RET>
          Perform an action with a ReferenceCountable resource and then release the resource.
static class ResourceUtils.WithKiji<RET>
          Perform an action with a Kiji instance and then release the instance.
static class ResourceUtils.WithKijiTable<RET>
          Perform an action with a KijiTable and then release the table.
static class ResourceUtils.WithKijiTableReader<RET>
          Perform an action with a KijiTableReader and then close the reader.
static class ResourceUtils.WithKijiTableWriter<RET>
          Perform an action with a KijiTableWriter and then close the writer.
